
model Person {
    fields {
        name Text
        favouriteThing Thing[] // There is no field for a hasMany in the db,
                                // so we won't see anything be deleted.
    }
}

model Thing {
    fields {
        description Text
    }
}

===

model Person {
    fields {
        name Text
    }
}

model Thing {
    fields {
        description Text
    }
}


===

=== 

[]
